intro: Nintendo Switch™ exclusive! High-quality graphics show battlefield reality. Team-based tactical gameplay with comrades. FPS with excitement and precise gun control!
description:
Experience the ultimate battle on a photorealistic battlefield and witness the emotional ending firsthand!
Utilize the unique characteristics of weapons categorized as Assault, Support, and Sniper, Aim your firearms and use more precise controls,
Understand the missions for each game mode and participate in combat to complete special missions.

・Enter the battlefield as a member of a world-class special forces unit and complete special missions.
・Experience thrilling battlefields rendered with photo-realistic graphics.
・Enjoy strategic gameplay utilizing the characteristics of 3 characters (Assault, Support, Sniper).
・Engage in the Deathmatch Mode where you can prove your superior combat skills in direct confrontation with enemies.
・Play the Domination Mode where you capture battle zones to secure tactically advantageous positions.
・Experience the Search and Destroy mode where you plant explosives in designated locations and defend against defusing attempts.
・Achieve victory by maximizing gun control with precise aiming and tilt systems.
・Feel the exhilaration of thrilling victories through teamwork.

The reality of combat that excites military fans!
Precise gun control that shines through the tension!
Be sure to enjoy [Zero Hour], the ultimate team-based single player FPS game where you fight alongside your comrades!

Synopsis
International conflicts are intensifying over a rare energy source discovered in an unknown land.
Each country has deployed their elite special agents to secure this resource.
You are an agent at the forefront of this fierce competition.
Infiltrate deep into enemy territory to dominate strategic points, destroy enemy facilities, and steal crucial information.
Breathtaking engagements in bullet-ridden cities and treacherous terrains, covert infiltration operations,
and destructive demolition missions await you.
The fate of your nation rests in your hands. 
Enter the battlefield now!
